changeNote.en-GB: Change Note 2015-08-27: This concept was merged into concept medtop:20000143 as their semantics were not sufficiently different

definition.de: Notfall bei dem ein oder mehrere Fahrzeuge verwickelt sind
definition.dk: En hændelse, der involverer et eller flere køretøjer.
definition.en-GB: An incident involving one or more vehicles
definition.en-US: An incident involving one or more vehicles
definition.pt-BR: Um acidente que envolve um ou mais veículos.
definition.pt-PT: Um acidente que envolve um ou mais veículos.
definition.zh-Hans: 涉及一辆或多辆汽车的意外事件
